pkmkdoc.description:
Bosto makes a really good tablet which is a cheap cintiq clone.
Unfortunately there are no mac drivers. This is my hobby attempt to make a mac driver for the tablet. I've never done a hardware driver before; so this is still a work in progress..
Some things are good: Fast, Works with Flash, fireworks, Sketchbook express, Corel Painter, works with the operating system, works with other paint packages,
Some things are not so good: No Pressure in corel painter,
And some things just plain suck: Only tested on Bostom 19mb - I have no idea if it will work on other bosto tablets, Doesn't work with Adobe Photoshop CS6, or CS5 Does not have any smoothing of pressure or coordinates - this is going to be a deal breaker for most of you : if you draw lines really slowly - you get a lot of "noise" and jitter - in some packages you'll find you get more pressure at the end of your strokes..
What I'm doing about all of this: Well - I am doing this for free in my (rare) spare time.. I'm Putting up there in the hope that others will help me take it forward - seeing as a lot of the heavy lifting has already been done. If not - I'll chip away at it a bit at a time as time allows.
You can get updates on the status at: https://trello.com/board/bostotabletdrivermac/515d7c50420441240f003bd5
And can contact me via the github page: https://github.com/georgejecook/BostoTabletDriverMac
